snippet: As the 50th anniversary of Lyndon B. Johnson’s presidential milestones approaches, his allies are highlighting domestic successes they say were overshadowed by the Vietnam War.
abstract: Luci Baines Johnson, daughter of former Pres Lyndon B Johnson, and his diminishing inner circle, are seeking a reconsideration of his legacy as president, arguing that it has been overwhelmed by tragedy of Vietnam War; as 50th anniversary of Johnson's presidential milestones approaches, they are highlighting domestic legislative successes enacted in his last five years in office.
lead_paragraph: As the 50th anniversary of Lyndon B. Johnson’s presidential milestones approaches, his allies are highlighting domestic successes they say were overshadowed by the Vietnam War.

headline.main: Rescuing a Vietnam Casualty: Johnson’s Legacy
headline.print_headline: Rescuing a Vietnam Casualty: Johnson’s Legacy
